full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 462 Filed 11/15/21 Page 24 of 32 Juror ID: 44a. If yes, please explain: 45. Have you or a family member ever supported, lobbied, petitioned, protested, or worked in any other manner for or against any laws, regulations, or organizations relating to sex trafficking, sex crimes against minors, sex abuse, or sexual harassment? Yes No 45a. If yes, please explain when and what you or your family member did: 45b. If your answer to 45 was yes, do you believe that this would affect your ability to serve fairly and impartially as a juror in this case? Yes No 45c. If yes to 45b, please explain: 46. The witnesses in this case may include law enforcement witnesses. Would you have any difficulty assessing the credibility of a law enforcement officer just like you would any other witness? Yes No 46a. If yes, please explain: -23- DOJ-OGR-00007040
